QuestData.Title: Shredder vs. Saberon
QuestData.Description: The saberon took their treasure up the rise and barricaded themselves in after Birchus attacked. It will be difficult to get in but I hear you have resources to handle this.$b$bOne of their entrances is covered with tough vegetation. I believe you have a mechanical solution to this problem in the form of a shredder. I think you know what to do...
QuestData.LogDescription: Break the vine barrier using your shredder.
QuestData.RewardText: Your machine is brutish but effective, well done $p. We must make haste before the plants realize the way is open.

Objectives.Objective: Shred the vine barrier and enter the saberon camp
